trans-unit.source: Defines the usage of a key contained within an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 定義 X.509 憑證包含的索引鍵的用法。

trans-unit.source: The X509KeyUsageExtension class uses the flags in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags> enumeration to define or determine key usage.
trans-unit.target: X509KeyUsageExtension 類別使用中的旗標<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags>來定義，或判斷金鑰使用方式的列舉。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref>物件，可識別副檔名是否為重要的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create the extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在要建立擴充功能的資訊，請使用這個建構函式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立擴充功能編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果延伸模組是關鍵的;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags"></xref> value and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref>類別使用指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags"></xref>值以及識別是否延伸模組是重要的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags"></xref> values that describes how to use the key.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageFlags"></xref>描述如何使用索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果延伸模組是關鍵的;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyUsageExtension"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立擴充功能編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key usage flag associated with the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得與憑證相關聯的金鑰使用方式旗標。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a value from the KeyUsages enumeration that indicates how to use the certificate key.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回值，從 keyusages 中列舉值，指出如何使用憑證金鑰。
